Padded armour, small shield, hand axes ×2, darts ×4, backpack, bandages, winter blanket, chalk (piece), disguise
clothing, grappling hook, grease, marbles ×20, parchment, wooden pole (10-ft.), soft leather pouch, iron
rations (1 week), hemp rope (50-ft.), small sack, thieves’ tools, tinderbox, torches ×3, wineskin (full), writing
stick, and 1d4+1 gold pieces.
